document.full_text: yemen's opposition signed a gulf-brokered transition deal on saturday that will ease president ali abdullah saleh out of power within a month, provided he ratifies the agreement as promised on sunday.
document.title: yemen opposition signs transition of power deal
lines_and_colors: yemen's opposition signed a gulf-brokered transition deal on saturday that will ease president ali abdullah saleh out of power within a month, provided he ratifies the agreement as promised on sunday.
